problem.markdown: >>The benefits of straw as a building material include which of the following?<< Choose the THREE characteristics that apply. [x] straw is a potentially renewable resource [ ] straw produces extra transportation emissions [x] when the straw was growing, it sequestered carbon [ ] straw does not require any net carbon dioxide emissions to produce [x] straw does not require as much energy to produce as manufactured fossil-fuel based insulation [explanation] Straw is a crop so it is potentially renewable and it contains carbon, so if left inside a house it won’t release that carbon. Relative to manufactured fossil-fuel based insulation products straw does not require a great deal of energy to produce. [explanation]
problem.p: The benefits of straw as a building material include which of the following? Choose the THREE characteristics that apply.

checkboxgroup.label: The benefits of straw as a building material include which of the following?
checkboxgroup.choice: straw is a potentially renewable resource
when the straw was growing, it sequestered carbon
straw does not require any net carbon dioxide emissions to produce
straw does not require as much energy to produce as manufactured fossil-fuel based insulation

div.p: Straw is a crop so it is potentially renewable and it contains carbon, so if left inside a house it won’t release that carbon. Relative to manufactured fossil-fuel based insulation products straw does not require a great deal of energy to produce.
